title: STAT+: ‘Moonshot’ agency ARPA-H lays off staff meant to commercialize breakthroughs
description: As the new director of ARPA-H, Alicia Jackson, takes over the DARPA-inspired agency, layoffs are made.
content: As the new director of ARPA-H, Alicia Jackson, takes over the DARPA-inspired agency, layoffs are made.
